nodes.text: The Even Cut Sabacc Parlor and Casino

The Even Cut Sabacc Parlor and Casino was a gambling stablishment operating in the town of Bartyn's Landing, in the planet Lamaredd, as of 29 BBY. It was owned by the attractive female Mon Calamari Nyubuna Bulul.
This locale was in front of Miss Mylla's Saloon, which was its direct competitor as both of them offered services. The Even Cut specialized in gambling and offered a sabacc table at any moment.
